channel.title: ★ Agaroth317 ★ GE ★ Gambling ★ 24 skills ★ 18 Bosses ★ Boss pets ★ Economy
channel.description:
[center][img]http://agaroth.com/logo.png[/img]
[b]Welcome to Agaroth, community private server.[/b]
[url=http://agaroth.com][img]http://agaroth.com/visit.png[/img][/url]
[b]Agaroth is using loginserver to load client files! This means that instead downloading 200mb cache file, client downloads ONLY 4mb files before you can play! It takes you only matter of seconds to log in after running client first time! Come and see yourself![/b]
Agaroth is brand new private server by creators of oldschool servers like Eustaria (2015), RuneClash (2014) & Hellhounderz (2008). With our new server, we want to do something different. We want Agaroth community to take a charge of content and changes. Instead developers packing server with unwanted and unattractive content, only players suggestions and requests will be added. Concept is to collect all the ideas every week and poll them over weekend. Similar to Old school RuneScape, ideas that gather more than 75% up-votes and wont have big negative impact on game play, will be programmed into server regardless if owner/developers want them or not.
For this project, we found best possible source to start with. Source with least bugs to fix and most content to enjoy, allowing developers to spend more time interacting with community and spend less time fixing existing content. Credits for source goes to [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/swiffy/]Swiffy[/url], who made this even possible for us. You can find his original release [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/606076-ruse-release-grand-exchange-ironman-modes-extremely-stable-anti-ctf-wpe.html]here[/url].
[b][size=large]Agaroth key features[/size][/b]
15+ bosses, including 100% Nex and Kalphite Queens with stages Full clanchats with lootshare & coinshare & ranks Ironman, Ultimate ironman, Hardcore ironman Full bank system with searching, tabs and pins Full screen & resizable client & HD textures Dungeoneering with parties/complexity 100% Runescape grand exchange Loyalty programme with 30+ titles Ingame highscores & scoreboards Bounty hunter with potential 100+ Achievements 25+ Boss pets
Perfect combat with soaking and deflecting Overload, extreme and recovery potions Automatic double Experience weekends Curses & newest regular prayers Well of goodwill for double exp Quickprayers & Quickcuses PvP drops & Killstreaks Correct fight styles Dwarf multicannon Chat emoticons Price checker Pathfinder Poisoning 2 Quests Pest control Warriors guild Chaos tunnels Shooting stars Nomad minigame Flawless duel arena Full barrows minigame Fight caves & Fight pits Puro Puro hunter minigame Custom graveyard minigame
Money pouches Brawling gloves Effigy crafting Crystal chest PvP artifacts Daily lottery Drop logs Bank pins
[b][size=x-large]Agaroth Media
[/size][/b][img]http://agaroth.com/ss1.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: ★ Agaroth317 ★ GE ★ Gambling ★ 24 skills ★ 18 Bosses ★ Boss pets ★ Economy
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

We have released new boss and new armour set! Venenatis Boss & Dragonbone melee set![/align]

Venenantis is combat 464 wilderness boss.[/align]

Venenantis is located in level 17 wilderness, just slightly north-west from chaos altar teleport.[/align]
Boss is located in single combat area, means its not possible to team up and kill Venenantis with team, unless “tag teamed”.[/align]
Venenantis uses all 3 combat styles and can hit up to 450. Venenantis is poisonous![/align]

Venenantis cannot be attacked with range, mage or regular weapons. It is required to use Veracs armour set[/align] to damage Venenantis. [/align] You can obtain veracs set by playing Barrows minigame, spend 45 vote points to buy set from vote store, or buy a set from donator store.
Venenantis can easely kill you if you lose guard… However, since area is single combat area and located below 20 wilderness,
while you under attack by Venenantis, other players cannot attack you and you can easely teleport out from wilderness.

[size=medium]Here is recommended setup to kill Venenantis[/size]

[size=medium][/size]

Since Venenantis is one of few solo bosses we have in Agaroth, he deserves worthy drops!
Venenantis drops our latest edition to overpowered items, dragonbone melee set.

Dragonbone melee set is currently most powerful melee gear you can possibly obtain. Dragonbone defensive stats are higher than previously strongest armour ingame, Torva. (todo=
Dragonbone is not only most strongest armour, its also most deadliest… Dragonbone set totals (todo) extra strength damage.
Thats not all… What makes dragonbone special, is its soaking. Dragonbone can soak up to 150 melee damage and almost 100 range & magic damage![/align]

Image (Todo)

In other news:

WE CURRENTLY HAVE EVENT RUNNING FOR FREE DONATOR RANKS & MORE REWARDS~!

Added new melee armour set: Dragonbone

Added dragonbone set to donator store

Changed NPC Agression tolerance time from 5 minutes to 20 minutes

Removed message when beeing skulled

Fixed Verac`s flail combat styles

Removed 50% revenant implings

Lowered Droprate of following NPC-s

* Revenant impling & revenant golbin
* Godwars minions
* Glacors

Buffed following NPC-s droprates

* High level revenants
* Godwars bosses
* Chaos elemental
* Nex

Buffed combat stats for following NPC-s

* Glacors
* Revenant impling & Goblin
* High level revenants (minor)

Read full topic

item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

[size=large]We have currently Official event running with rewards! Check it out here![/size]

New items released:

* Anonymus mask
* Partyhat & Specs
* Musketeer hat
* Briefcase

Edited login messages & random messages sent to players while logged in

Removed info spam when opening store as new player

Fixed & adjusted player points counting and refreshing

Fixed character rollbacks when disconnecting due server lagg

Chaotic kiteshield, Eagle-eye kiteshield & farseer kiteshield are now untradable

Adjusted alch/base prices for following items:

* Amulet of fury (from 4m to 14m)
* Dragonfire shield (from 10m to 18m)
* Bandos hilt & godsword (from 10m to 20m)
* Zamorak hilt & godsword (from 10m to 25m)
* Saradomin hilt & godsword (from 10m to 30m)
* Armadyl hilt & godsword (from 10m to 35m)
* Zamorakian spear (from 300k to 16m)
* Bandos tassets & chestplate (from 10m to 20m)
* Armadyl skirt & chest (from 10m to 20m)
* Bandos boots (from 10m to 3m)
* Saradomin spear (from 10m to 16m)
* Dragon boots (from 300k to 2m)
* Korasis sword (from 10m to 27m)
* Abyssal whip (from 500k to 15m)
* Granite maul (from 200k to 1m)
* Dragon claws (from 10m to 30m)
* Handcannon (from 200k to 2m)
* Torva parts (from 10m to 30m)
* Pernix cowl (from 100m to 30m)
* Pernix parts (from 10m to 30m)
* Virtus parts (from 10m to 30m)
* Partyhats (from 10m to 100m)
* Santa hat (from 10m to 80m)
* Bunny ears (from 0gp to 90m)
* Spirit shield (from 100k to 1m)
* Blessed spirit shield (from 150k to 1,5m)
* Arcane spirit shield (from 10m to 45m)
* Spectral spirit shield (from 10m to 25m
* Elysian spirit shield (10m to 90m)
* Divine spirit shield (10m to 100m)

Fixed herblore ingredient book

Adjusted donator store prices (Some lower some higher, end of discount)

Following items removed from donator store

* Animal staves (Now discontinued)
* Mystery box
* Legendary mystery box

New items added to donator store

* Anonymus mask (300 Donator points)
* Partyhat & Specs (300 Donator points)
* Musketeer hat (120 Donator points)
* Briefcase (100 donator points)

item.dc:creator: @Eustaria1 Eustaria1
item.description:
@Eustaria1 wrote:

Added Gem trader NPC for pickpocketing (Donator only)

Lowered xp gains from rune armour pickpocketing from 24k to 16k

Fixed ability to cancel slayer task & points going negative

lowered Red chinchompa buy price by 30%, grey chinchompa by 15%

Added Ferrets to hunter area (donator only)

Dungeoneering prestige is now capped at 15 prestige for non donator

Highscores has been added, ::hs command

[Bronze member]

20% Chance of receiving up to 2 extra agility ticket after lap complete
Ability to mix 4 dose extreme & overload potions instead 4 dose
Ability to pickpocket gem trader with higher than 93 thieving
Resetting Solo & Duo slayer task costs 4 slayer points instead 5
Ability to hunt Ferrets
Dungeoneering max prestige 20 instead 15

[Silver member]

25% Chance of receiving up to 2 extra agility ticket after lap complete
Ability to mix 4 dose extreme & overload potions instead 4 dose
Ability to pickpocket gem trader with higher than 93 thieving
Resetting Solo & Duo slayer task costs 3 slayer points instead 5
Ability to hunt Ferrets
Dungeoneering max prestige 23 instead 15

[Gold member]

33% Chance of receiving up to 2 extra agility ticket after lap complete
Ability to mix 4 dose extreme & overload potions instead 4 dose
Ability to pickpocket gem trader with higher than 93 thieving
Resetting Solo & Duo slayer task costs 2 slayer points instead 5
Ability to hunt Ferrets
Dungeoneering max prestige 25 instead 15

[Platinum member]

50% Chance of receiving up to 2 extra agility ticket after lap complete
Ability to mix 4 dose extreme & overload potions instead 4 dose
Ability to pickpocket gem trader with higher than 93 thieving
Resetting Solo & Duo slayer task costs 1 slayer points instead 5
Ability to hunt Ferrets
Dungeoneering max prestige 27 instead 15

[Diamond member]

100% Chance of receiving up to 2 extra agility ticket after lap complete
Ability to mix 4 dose extreme & overload potions instead 4 dose
Ability to pickpocket gem trader with higher than 93 thieving
Resetting Solo & Duo slayer task is free instead 5 slayer points
Ability to hunt Ferrets
Dungeoneering max prestige 30 instead 15

item.dc:creator: @Eustaria1 Eustaria1
item.description:
@Eustaria1 wrote:

Fixed dungeoneering tokens message giving wrong amount of tokens received

Fixed Scorpia dropping Diary instead dragon boots

Raised Scorpia mage defence by 10%, melee & range defence by 50%

Doubled Scorpia respawn time and rised hitpoints by 10%

Jad is now immune to magic

Scorpia is not immune to Ice and binding effects

Added farseer helm to melee armour store

Added Scorpia to boss logs list

Added new item, Ecumenical key. Key allows you to enter godwars without killcount

Godwars bosses and followers now drops Ecumenical key

Ecumenical key added to vote store and prestige store

Fixed saradomin godwars minions not dropping anything

Fixed random spacebars in message when new player joins

Removed Scythe from starter pack

Replaced starter items with “Free to play starter pack” item

Removed all bonuses from Scythe and its now decorative

Lowered Divine spirit shield prayer drain

Removed Elysian spirit shield prayer drain (Chance of blocking 25% damage 75% times)

Removed Soak effects from Arcane & Spectral spirit shields (Was same as Divine)

Overload potion now restores your HP to full when worn out

Nerfed Enchanted bolts contantly special attcking (from 20% to 10%)

Lowered Prayer xp for regular prayer when used bones on altar by 10%

[Bronze member]

3% higher chance to trigger bolt special attack
10% More Prayer experience when used bones on altar
10% Less damage from Siphoning energy in Runespan

[Silver member]

5% higher chance to trigger bolt special attack
20% More Prayer experience when used bones on altar
17% Less damage from Siphoning energy in Runespan

[Gold member]

8% higher chance to trigger bolt special attack
30% More Prayer experience when used bones on altar
22% Less damage from Siphoning energy in Runespan

[Platinum member]

10% higher chance to trigger bolt special attack
40% More Prayer experience when used bones on altar
25% Less damage from Siphoning energy in Runespan

[Diamond member]

13% higher chance to trigger bolt special attack
50% More Prayer experience when used bones on altar
5% Less damage from Siphoning energy in Runespan
30% Less damage from Siphoning energy in Runespan

item.title: ★ Agaroth317 ★ GE ★ Gambling ★ 24 skills ★ 18 Bosses ★ Boss pets ★ Economy
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

Fixed typos when you claim Donator points

Added 30 seconds cooldown for dragonfire shield

Avas accumulator now collects majority of used arrows

Max cape now acts similar to ava`s accumulator

You can no longer prestige or reset skills while having cannon set up

Fixed magic dart casting animation

Added slayer staff to slayer store for 1M coins

You can load cannonballs now only to empty or almost empty cannon

Fixed slayer ring teleport to Orks

Removed Nex as elite slayer task

Changes to slayer tasks

Kuradel can now assign Black dragons as hard slayer task
Duradel can now assign Bronze dragons as medium slayer task
Kuradel can now assign Dark beasts as hard slayer task
Kuradel can now assign Abyssal demons as hard slayer task
Nex has been removed as Elite slayer task from Summona
Summona can now assign Glacors as elite slayer task
Summona can now assign Jad as elite slayer task

You can now access dark beasts only by using slayer ring while on slayer task

Revenants area is now multi combat area

Tzhaar city is now multi combat area

Nerfed corporeal beast:

Max hit from 650 to 550
hitpoints from 28000 to 22000
Attack bonus from 410 to 380
Each combat style defence by 20 levels

Nerfed chaos elemental:

Max hit from 440 to 400
hitpoints from 18000 to 14000
Attack bonus from 320 to 300

Nerfed Glacor:

hitpoints from 6900 to 5400

Lowered Mining xp from Addy rock 15%, rune rock 40%, Crashed star lowered from 16k to 6k Exp.

Added 90 defence requirement to primal armour and 90 attack requirement for primal weapons

Added 90 defence and range requirement for Sagittarian equipment

Added 90 defence and mage requirement for Celestial equipment

Added 60 defence requirement for Dragon plateskirt

You can no longer trade in group dungeoneering

Fixed Black armor set skirt/platelegs swap

Rune thrownaxe now requires 60 range

Fixed invisible mime mask

Added 2 extra blue dragons to taverly dungeon

Fixed tiaras tuning head invisible

Removed capt`n NPC from wildy agility

You can now cook & eat mackerel

You can now Disassemble full slayer helmet

Read full topic

item.title: ★ Agaroth317 ★ GE ★ Gambling ★ 24 skills ★ 18 Bosses ★ Boss pets ★ Economy
item.dc:creator: @rs614 rs614
item.description:
@rs614 wrote:

Fixed link to ironman guide in forums at tutorial

Removed “Set an email” achievement

Removed Email recovery option from server

Fixed Body, Fire, Chaos and Law runecrafting

Adjusted RuneSpan level requirements (Green from 40 to 50, Yellow from 72 to 75)

Lowered experience gains from Runespan by 15%. Lowered damage taken from Energy by 15%

Following items are now untradable:

Boss and monster pets
Charming imp
Eagle-eye kiteshield
Runecrafting pouches

Added Farseer kiteshield & Pet Jad to donator store

Bumped Pet Jad price from 300k tokkuls to 400k tokkuls

Added Eagle-eye kiteshield & Farseer kiteshield to dungeoneering store

Fixed typos in tutorial and donator shops

Added confirmation dialogue to ::empty command to stop macroing

Added ::dzone command to access donator area from everywhere

Lowered Inferno Adze woodcutting requirement from 80 to 75 & Mining from 80 to 71

Added information line upon equipping Inferno Adze

You no longer lose your skills and items when changing game mode from ironman to normal

Teleblock now works with wilderness obelisks

Fixed Wilderness teleport coords and dialogues & Mage bank teleport

New restrictions added for new players to stop Item farming & advertising

You need to play least 15 minutes to access Grand exchange
You need to play least 15 minutes to trade other players
You need to play least 15 minutes to lose items when you die
You need to play least 15 minutes to stake items
You need to play least 15 minutes to drop items
You need to play least 15 minutes to receive/give PK points
You need to play least 5 minutes to talk in clanchat

Lowered Scythe strength bonus from 48 to 44

Added notifications when passed restrictions

Dragonfire shield can now hold 30 charges instead 20 and special can be casted with every charge

Restricted higher Staff interaction with players (Trading, Player killing etc)

Read full topic
